verses.verse: וַיַּקְהֵ֣ל <S%H6950><s%> assembled דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> all the princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> the princes הַשְּׁבָטִ֣ים <S%H7626><s%> of the tribes וְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> and the captains הַמַּחְלְק֣וֹת <S%H4256><s%> of the companies הַמְשָׁרְתִ֪ים <S%H8334><s%> that ministered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֟לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king וְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> and the captains הָאֲלָפִ֣ים <S%H505><s%> over the thousands וְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> and captains הַמֵּא֡וֹת <S%H3967><s%> over the hundreds וְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> and the stewards כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all רְכוּשׁ־ <S%H7399><s%> over all the substance וּמִקְנֶה֩ ׀ <S%H4735><s%> and possession לַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king וּלְבָנָ֜יו <S%H1121><s%> and of his sons עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַסָּרִיסִ֧ים <S%H5631><s%> with the officers וְהַגִּבּוֹרִ֛ים <S%H1368><s%> and with the mighty men וּֽלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גִּבּ֥וֹר <S%H1368><s%> men חָ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> and with all the valiant men אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> unto Jerusalem

וַיָּ֨קָם <S%H6965><s%> stood up דָּוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> Then David הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto רַגְלָ֔יו <S%H7272><s%> upon his feet וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said שְׁמָע֖וּנִי <S%H8085><s%> Hear אַחַ֣י <S%H251><s%> me my brethren וְעַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> and my people אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with לְבָבִ֡י <S%H3824><s%> [As for me] I [had] in mine heart לִבְנוֹת֩ <S%H1129><s%> to build בֵּ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> an house מְנוּחָ֜ה <S%H4496><s%> of rest לַאֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> for the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלַהֲדֹם֙ <S%H1916><s%> stool רַגְלֵ֣י <S%H7272><s%> to his feet אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God וַהֲכִינ֖וֹתִי <S%H3559><s%> and had made ready לִבְנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1129><s%> for the building

וְהָאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> But God אָ֣מַר <S%H559><s%> said לִ֔י לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִבְנֶ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> unto me Thou shalt not build בַ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לִשְׁמִ֑י <S%H8034><s%> for my name כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because אִ֧ישׁ <S%H376><s%> because thou [hast been] a man מִלְחָמ֛וֹת <S%H4421><s%> of war אַ֖תָּה <S%H859><s%> you וְדָמִ֥ים <S%H1818><s%> blood שָׁפָֽכְתָּ׃ <S%H8210><s%> and hast shed

וַיִּבְחַ֡ר <S%H977><s%> chose יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֵי֩ <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בִּ֜י מִכֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> all בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> me before all the house אָבִ֗י <S%H1><s%> of my father לִהְי֨וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become לְמֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to be king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> over Israel לְעוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for בִֽיהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> Judah בָּחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> for he hath chosen לְנָגִ֔יד <S%H5057><s%> [to be] the ruler וּבְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and of the house יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> of my father וּבִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and among the sons אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> of my father בִּ֣י רָצָ֔ה <S%H7521><s%> he liked לְהַמְלִ֖יךְ <S%H4427><s%> me to make [me] king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> over all Israel

וּמִכָּ֨ל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בָּנַ֔י <S%H1121><s%> And of all my sons כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for רַבִּ֣ים <S%H7227><s%> me many בָּנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> my son נָ֥תַן <S%H5414><s%> hath given לִ֖י יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> (for the LORD וַיִּבְחַר֙ <S%H977><s%> acceptable בִּשְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon בְנִ֔י <S%H1121><s%> my sons לָשֶׁ֗בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to sit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כִּסֵּ֛א <S%H3678><s%> upon the throne מַלְכ֥וּת <S%H4438><s%> of the kingdom יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> over Israel

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לִ֔י שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> unto me Solomon בִנְךָ֔ <S%H1121><s%> thy son הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> who יִבְנֶ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> he shall build בֵיתִ֖י <S%H1004><s%> my house וַחֲצֵרוֹתָ֑י <S%H2691><s%> and my courts כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָחַ֨רְתִּי <S%H977><s%> for I have chosen ב֥וֹ לִי֙ לְבֵ֔ן <S%H1121><s%> him [to be] my son וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I אֶֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לּ֥וֹ לְאָֽב׃ <S%H1><s%> and I will be his father

וַהֲכִינוֹתִ֥י <S%H3559><s%> Moreover I will establish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְכוּת֖וֹ <S%H4438><s%> his kingdom עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יֶחֱזַ֗ק <S%H2388><s%> if he be constant לַעֲשׂ֛וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do מִצְוֹתַ֥י <S%H4687><s%> my commandments וּמִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <S%H4941><s%> and my judgments כַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as at this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> he

וְ֠עַתָּה <S%H6258><s%> now לְעֵינֵ֨י <S%H5869><s%> Now therefore in the sight כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> of all Israel קְהַל־ <S%H6951><s%> the congregation יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּבְאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> and in the audience אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God שִׁמְר֣וּ <S%H8104><s%> keep וְדִרְשׁ֔וּ <S%H1875><s%> and seek כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְוֹ֖ת <S%H4687><s%> for all the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> your God לְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> so תִּֽירְשׁוּ֙ <S%H3423><s%> that ye may possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> this good וְהִנְחַלְתֶּ֛ם <S%H5157><s%> and leave [it] for an inheritance לִבְנֵיכֶ֥ם <S%H1121><s%> for your children אַחֲרֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H310><s%> after עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> you for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever פ

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you שְׁלֹמֹֽה־ <S%H8010><s%> And thou Solomon בְנִ֡י <S%H1121><s%> my son דַּע֩ <S%H3045><s%> know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵ֨י <S%H430><s%> thou the God אָבִ֜יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father וְעָבְדֵ֗הוּ <S%H5647><s%> and serve בְּלֵ֤ב <S%H3820><s%> heart שָׁלֵם֙ <S%H8003><s%> him with a perfect וּבְנֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> mind חֲפֵצָ֔ה <S%H2655><s%> and with a willing כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבָבוֹת֙ <S%H3824><s%> all hearts דּוֹרֵ֣שׁ <S%H1875><s%> searcheth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every יֵ֥צֶר <S%H3336><s%> all the imaginations מַחֲשָׁב֖וֹת <S%H4284><s%> of the thoughts מֵבִ֑ין <S%H995><s%> and understandeth אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> If תִּדְרְשֶׁ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H1875><s%> if thou seek יִמָּ֣צֵא <S%H4672><s%> him he will be found לָ֔ךְ וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if תַּֽעַזְבֶ֖נּוּ <S%H5800><s%> of thee but if thou forsake יַזְנִיחֲךָ֥ <S%H2186><s%> him he will cast thee off לָעַֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> for ever

רְאֵ֣ה ׀ <S%H7200><s%> Take heed עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> now for the LORD בָּ֧חַר <S%H977><s%> hath chosen בְּךָ֛ לִבְנֽוֹת־ <S%H1129><s%> thee to build בַּ֥יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לַמִּקְדָּ֖שׁ <S%H4720><s%> for the sanctuary חֲזַ֥ק <S%H2388><s%> be strong וַעֲשֵֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> and do פ

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> gave דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> Then David לִשְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> to Solomon בְנ֡וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תַּבְנִ֣ית <S%H8403><s%> the pattern הָאוּלָם֩ <S%H197><s%> of the porch וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּ֨תָּ֜יו <S%H1004><s%> and of the houses וְגַנְזַכָּ֧יו <S%H1597><s%> thereof and of the treasuries וַעֲלִיֹּתָ֛יו <S%H5944><s%> thereof and of the upper chambers וַחֲדָרָ֥יו <S%H2315><s%> parlours הַפְּנִימִ֖ים <S%H6442><s%> thereof and of the inner וּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> thereof and of the place הַכַּפֹּֽרֶת׃ <S%H3727><s%> of the mercy seat

וְתַבְנִ֗ית <S%H8403><s%> And the pattern כֹּל֩ <S%H3605><s%> of all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> he הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> had בָר֙וּחַ֙ <S%H7307><s%> of all that he had by the spirit עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> for לְחַצְר֧וֹת <S%H2691><s%> of the courts בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and for all הַלְּשָׁכ֖וֹת <S%H3957><s%> and of all the chambers סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> round about לְאֹֽצְרוֹת֙ <S%H214><s%> of the treasuries בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God וּלְאֹצְר֖וֹת <S%H214><s%> and of the treasuries הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6944><s%> of the dedicated things

וּֽלְמַחְלְקוֹת֙ <S%H4256><s%> Also for the courses הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites וּֽלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and for all מְלֶ֖אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> and for all the work עֲבוֹדַ֣ת <S%H5656><s%> of the service בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּֽלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and for all כְּלֵ֖י <S%H3627><s%> and for all the vessels עֲבוֹדַ֥ת <S%H5656><s%> of service בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

לַזָּהָ֤ב <S%H2091><s%> [He gave] of gold בַּמִּשְׁקָל֙ <S%H4948><s%> by weight לַזָּהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> for [things] of gold לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all כְּלֵ֖י <S%H3627><s%> for all instruments עֲבוֹדָ֣ה <S%H5656><s%> of all manner of service וַעֲבוֹדָ֑ה <S%H5656><s%> of every kind of service לְכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> every כְּלֵ֤י <S%H3627><s%> [silver also] for all instruments הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> of silver בְּמִשְׁקָ֔ל <S%H4948><s%> by weight לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all כְּלֵ֖י <S%H3627><s%> for all instruments עֲבוֹדָ֥ה <S%H5656><s%> kind וַעֲבוֹדָֽה׃ <S%H5656><s%> of service

וּמִשְׁקָ֞ל <S%H4948><s%> Even the weight לִמְנֹר֣וֹת <S%H4501><s%> for the candlesticks הַזָּהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וְנֵרֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5216><s%> and for their lamps זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold בְּמִשְׁקַל־ <S%H4948><s%> by weight מְנוֹרָ֥ה <S%H4501><s%> for every candlestick וּמְנוֹרָ֖ה <S%H4501><s%> thereof and for the candlesticks וְנֵרֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H5216><s%> and for the lamps וְלִמְנֹר֨וֹת <S%H4501><s%> [both] for the candlestick הַכֶּ֤סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver בְּמִשְׁקָל֙ <S%H4948><s%> by weight לִמְנוֹרָ֣ה <S%H4501><s%> of every candlestick וְנֵרֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H5216><s%> and [also] for the lamps כַּעֲבוֹדַ֖ת <S%H5656><s%> thereof according to the use מְנוֹרָ֥ה <S%H4501><s%> lampstand וּמְנוֹרָֽה׃ <S%H4501><s%> lampstand
